Product name: Powder Box, Houbigant Chantilly Dusting Powder, Vintage Toiletry, Pink Plastic Pot, Dressing Table Accessory, New Old Stock - 1960s / 1970s
Description:
A large Powder Box made by Houbigant in the 1960s / 1970s, in excellent condition.
This plastic powder pot features a plain pink lid with a simple framed gold ‘H’ on a white background. The design shows slight wear, mainly to the gold tone ‘H’ but this doesn’t detract from the overall design and contrasts the candy pink colour perfectly. 
A large gold rim sits under the lid, this shows slight surface scratches as to be expected of preloved items, but again this is minimal. The base of the piece shows a textured pattern to the pink plastic, at the centre of the base a smooth circle is embossed with the words ‘PARIS’, HOUBIGANT’,’NEW YORK’, ‘CHANTILLY’, ‘DUSTING POWDER’, ‘NET WT 3 OZ’. The letters ‘ADE’ are also stamped in purple ink on the raised design.
Once the lid is removed the aroma of the ‘CHANTILLY’ dusting powder fills the air, a pink powder puff and sealed powder section can also be seen. The satin section at the top of this large powder puff is marked ‘HOUBIGANT’ in gold lettering. The pink card stamped ‘CHANTILLY HOUBIGANT’ hides the unused powder. The inside of the pot is in excellent condition and shows no signs of use.
The perfect dressing table accessory!!
 Measurements:
- 13.6 cm / 5.4 inches length and width
- 5.2 cm / 2 inches width

https://www.etsy.com/uk/shop/CupfulofTrinkets?section_id=15767303&ref=shopsection_leftnav_3
If you're interested in other items, I do combine postage costs!

Product name: Circle Wall Clock, Patterned Clock, Modern Wall Clock, Unique Clock, Wooden Clock, Round Clock,  5th Anniversary Present, Engagement Gift
Description:
This wall clock is called "Circle Union". 
The design comprises of a random pattern of circles of various sizes joined in union to form a unique timepiece that looks great in any modern home.
Chapter markers are laser etched around the outside of the clock face.
The clock face is laser cut from eco friendly solid bamboo. 
Outside diameter of face at 280 mm (11") and protrudes 25 mm (1") from the wall.
The clock mechanism is a quartz sweep type which means its virtually silent (no ticking) and has black hands. 
Comes complete with integral fixing bracket so it`s ready to hang on the wall.
Requires 1 x AA battery .

Product name: Beard Oil Sampler - Wild Man Beard Conditioner - Limited Edition Trial Size Gift Set Stocking Stuffer
Description:
Wild Man Beard Oil Conditioner - Limited Edition Trial Size Sampler - Mens Grooming Gift / Beard Grooming / Stocking Stuffer
"Feel Rugged, Look Smooth"
Try each Wild Man Beard Conditioner holiday seasonal scent in this limited edition trial size four-pack! These unique blends are formulated with pure, therapeutic-grade essential oils and extracts suspended in hydrating grapeseed oil. You'll receive a 1 dram / 3.7 ml bottle of each formula, enough for 1-2 weeks of daily use per scent. Shipped in an unbleached cotton drawstring bag to keep your vials in order.
Add our traditional sampler set to your order and try all eight scents!
www.etsy.com/listing/188790951/wild-man-beard-oil-conditioner-trial
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
You will receive the following seasonal scents in 1 dram / 3.7 ml amber glass dropper vials:
Dark Roast Wild Man Beard Conditioner
https://www.etsy.com/listing/200762379/wild-man-beard-oil-conditioner-dark
Rich, fresh-brewed coffee with sweet undertones. We use organic coffee extract and coffee bean essential oil for a well-rounded caffeine kick for your beard.
Solstice Wild Man Beard Conditioner
https://www.etsy.com/listing/200752510/wild-man-beard-oil-conditioner-solstice
Refreshing and cool with a warm, gentle spice. A calming balance of extremes, this complex oil has a little something for everyone.
Windfall Wild Man Beard Conditioner
https://www.etsy.com/listing/200760355/wild-man-beard-oil-conditioner-windfall
Autumn-sweet apple with a deep, warming spice. We use certified organic, true-to-source apple extract for a genuine scent that is not overpowering. Just crisp, spiced apple for your Autumn-bearding enjoyment.
Yule Wild Man Beard Conditioner
https://www.etsy.com/listing/200761531/wild-man-beard-oil-conditioner-yule
The festive scent of an ancient conifer forest blended to pine perfection. We took the highest quality organic and wildcrafted evergreen essential oils to bring you the best, most balanced pine tree scent you will ever find. Commence merriment!
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
OUR FORMULA
Wild Man Beard Conditioner is a highly absorbent, moisturizing and lightweight oil ideal for the daily maintenance of the skin and beard. Perfect for all skin and hair types, this oil mimics your skin's natural moisturizers, absorbs quickly, strengthens hair and leaves your beard with a subtle shine and soft feel. Our unique therapeutic grade essential oil blends naturally condition hair and act as an aromatherapy aid with a subtle, beard-appropriate scent. Each Wild Rose product is ethically crafted from the finest natural ingredients available. We believe in full transparency and welcome all of your questions.
All Natural - GMO Free - Vegan - Cruelty Free
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
HOW TO USE BEARD CONDITIONER
Massage a few drops into a dry beard to keep it growing thick, soft and clean. Moisturizes dry skin and softens rough hair. Applying to a dry beard maximizes absorption and softening power of this leave-in conditioning oil. Perfect for any form of facial hair from stubbly beard beginnings to knee-length face beast. Start with just 3-4 drops of Beard Conditioner and increase depending on beard length and skin type. For best results, wash and thoroughly dry the beard using Wild Man Beard Wash as needed, several times a week:
www.etsy.com/listing/114765876/wild-man-beard-wash-the-original-60ml
If you have very dry or flaky skin beneath the beard, be sure to massage down to the roots. Extremely dry beards will benefit from using our Beard Cream:
www.etsy.com/listing/108340178/wild-man-beard-cream-the-original-beard
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
We do not recommend rubber bulb/dropper bottles for long term use with oil-based products. Eventually the rubber will begin to expand and break down. These droppers will hold up for several months of use with this trial size set. To lengthen the life of your dropper bottles, always store them upright when not in use. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.
Hungry for more Man goods and gift sets? Check out the Wild Man Section:
www.etsy.com/shop/WildRoseHerbs?section_id=10666372
Exclusive Wild Rose gift wrap is available for purchase here:
www.etsy.com/listing/80163413/gift-wrap-for-wild-rose-herbs
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
FEEDBACK FOR WILD MAN:
"The smell is great, not too heavy. The products apply easily and the conditioner (oil) does not come out fast, so it does not get wasted. But more importantly of all, my husbands beard has never been softer! He has a very curly and course beard and now it is just as smooth as the hair on the top of his head! We have tried many different products but none have done what this set has. It keeps the skin underneath clean but not dry, it softens the hair, and it smells wonderful. .'"
"as an ambassador for the manly man, I have to say this is a fantastic product, within seconds and i am not kidding my beard became softer and took on a beautiful lustre. The perfume of the essential oils blended wonderfully with my bay rum and i really cannot recommend this product more. Oh my girlfriend liked the feel and smell too!!! fantastic."
"Never have I had such a luxurious beard, women now swoon at my feet and men grow shameful of their ragged tufts of chin fuzz. I know now what my life could be...what my beard could be. Anyone sitting on the fence about this product should stop sitting there with a sub-par beard and embrace the wild man. "
"I bought it for my boyfriend, he loves it, and I do too!! The scent is perfectly measured, I thought it would be way more powerful, but as I said it is just perfect! It also makes the beard really soft, and thanks to this product, there is no more conflict between my sensitive skin and his beard! "
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Product name: Beautiful Mix of Glittery Blue, Pink and White Paints - MacBook Hard Protective Case for MacBook Pro, Air, Air Retina, Pro Retina & 2016 Pro
Description:
Beautiful Mix of Glittery Blue, Pink and White Paints beautifully reproduced to decorate your MacBook. Detail of a Painters Palette handmade by the Giant Sparrows team.
A great gift for anyone who has everything!
Our MacBook cases come in two pieces to protect both your MacBook lid and the base.  The case is made from a clear, tough polycarbonate.
The case cover is printed using a UV process which lays down the ink in layers, creating a slightly textured surface. The base case is left unprinted and has little non slip pads. The case clips onto the MacBook providing excellent protection with access to all ports, lights and buttons.
All our cases are printed on demand and you can choose to have your case printed to either display the apple logo "With Apple Logo", or your selected design can be printed to cover the entire lid "Without Apple Logo". Please select from the dropdown menu.
If you're unsure of what model of macbook you have you this link will help https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT201608
This design is available for the following MacBook Models:
o	11" MacBook case
o	12" MacBook case
o	13" MacBook Air
o	13" MacBook Pro
o	13" MacBook Pro Retina
o	13” MacBook Pro 2016
o	15" MacBook Pro
o	15" MacBook Pro Retina
o	15" MacBook Pro 2016

www.facebook.com/wobbleandsqueak
Feedback/Terms and Conditions (please read if you get a sec)
Hello Guys and Girls, we here at Wobble & Squeak HQ aim to please and hope you like our items as much as we do; after all they were made with LOVE!!!  However if you do have a problem with any aspect of our service (and we sincerely hope you won’t) please drop us a message at the first possible opportunity rather than leaving us negative feedback.  In our experience most issues can be resolved very easily and amicably.
Returns (UK BUYERS).
Returns are accepted within 14 days as long as the item/s are undamaged and in a resalable condition. The buyer is required to pay return postage unless the item is faulty in which case a full refund will be given. We offer a choice of two postal services for our UK buyers; 2nd class signed or second class standard (we have listed the 'signed for service' by default). If you choose to get your item sent second class standard and it gets lost by Royal Mail we here at Wobble and Squeak Clothing cannot be held responsible. This is because you have been given the choice, and you the buyer has chosen not to use the recorded delivery service offered. Really sorry, but we cannot afford to lose stock by sending out replacements in this instance.
International Shipping and Returns
As for international shipping, we are quite happy to post far and wide so please feel free to send us a message about specific shipping costs.  Returns again will be at the buyer’s expense.  The shipping price stated in the listing is for our international TRACKED service. If you would like an item sent international standard (not tracked) please let us know, but any items lost en route will NOT be the responsibility of Wobble and Squeak. Any international items returned to us because of incorrect addresses or the buyer not being available to receive the parcel will incur a 20% surcharge and/or be liable for the return postage, if another dispatch is wanted. (Sorry but we’re a new company and it’s safer this way for now). Please see our domestic returns policy for more info.xx
WE OFFER REDUCED SHIPPING COSTS FOR MULTIPLE ITEMS, SO GET IN TOUCH BEFORE PURCHASE AND SAVE YOURSELF SOME WOBBLY PENNIES!
Swatch photos may differ from product received due to computer resolution, light and other factors.

Product name: Mens and Womens sizes. Custom Cut & Sew marvel superheroes comics pouch pocket hoodies. See kids section for childrens.
Description:
NOTE: SHIPPING TIME HAS BEEN TEMPORARILY CHANGED FROM 7 BUSINESS DAYS TO TWO WEEKS DUE TO GOING AWAY ON HOLIDAY. THIS ITEM WILL BE MADE AND DISPATCHED IN 2 WEEKS. 
I aim to dispatch this particular item within 1-2 weeks. I cannot guarantee this due to high volume orders so do allow a few days extra incase I'm a little backed up. Orders due out on a weekend will be shipped the following working day. International customers must check the delivery times before purchasing. I cannot stress the importance of this. I cannot be held responsible for customs delays so I would advise you to pay for tracked shipping.
If purchasing as a gift, please contact me first before purchasing so I am aware I need to meet a deadline. I cannot be held responsible for missed deadlines. If I'm unable to meet your deadline I will let you know. 
Please also be advised that I'm making some improvements to my lifestyle and the way I run the business. Last year I was on call 7 days a week and this wasn't good for my health and wellbeing. Please respect my personal time over the weekend and during the evenings after 5.30pm. I will not be responding to messages until I'm back in the workshop. I assure you I will respond within a day or so (except for weekends.) Thank you in advance.
Shipping to the UK is fully tracked with every purchase. I have now raised the price for international shipping as more and more customers have been asking for tracking numbers after shipment when the £6 standard shipping has been purchased. £10 is extremely pricey but this is the cost to ship a t-shirt tracked and signed to international destinations. Paying that little extra gives you peace of mind. Unfortunately Canadian customers will only receive a tracking number which shows the parcel in transit and parcel delivered. Canada doesn't currently offer a fully tracked service from the UK. If you want to pay for an untracked service at £6 please contact me before making a purchase. 
DUE TO THE UNIQUE APPLICATION OF FABRIC, EACH HOODIE POUCH WILL DIFFER FROM THE IMAGE SHOWN. EVERY LAPTOP LCD HAS A VARIED COLOUR AND RESOLUTION SETTING SO COLOUR MAY SLIGHTLY DIFFER.
Product info: Hand sewn and altered in my studio. Remember, these aren't machine produced so they aren't perfect but I do aim to perfect stitching. Printed logo to the chest. 100% cotton. Draw string hood. This item is brand new with tags. Comfortable kangaroo pouch pocket.
